Grants were canceled to institutions like Harvard and Stanford for research projects in Africa even though Google's senior management had approved them and they lacked only a final signature on the contracts. That may be the way things are done in business, but it's not how grants are made in the nonprofit world, said the former href="http://Google.org"> Google.org executive.`` It was embarrassing.''
